    • Class s3games.gui.GameWindow extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • game

          Game game
          currently played game

        • boardCanvas

          BoardCanvas boardCanvas
          the board canvas that shows the game progress

        • repaint

          boolean repaint
          a repaint request

        • outputTexts

          java.util.ArrayList<E> outputTexts
          text that is shown to the user of various info

        • winner

          java.lang.String winner
          the winner of the last game

        • offsetX

          int offsetX
          for drawing of text = distance of right gap from left side

        • isSelectedElement

          boolean isSelectedElement
          determines if any element has been selected for a move

        • selectedElementName

          java.lang.String selectedElementName
          which element has been selected

        • lastMove

          Move lastMove
          the move that was performed for the mouse player

        • lastMoveReady

          java.lang.Object lastMoveReady
          synchronization object for the mouse player to indicate a user has made a new move

        • waitingForMove

          boolean waitingForMove
          is it our turn? should we allow the user to make the move?

        • allowedMoves

          java.util.ArrayList<E> allowedMoves
          list of allowed moves

        • gameRuns

          Switch gameRuns
          switch indicates whether the game is still on

        • canvas1

          java.awt.Canvas canvas1
